name: Hyperloops
description:
How to Play
  • Place tiles on the grid by tapping or dragging them.
  • When tiles make a loop of any form they disappear.
  • The longer the loop – the more points you get.
  • Creating a loop also restores some time.
  • If the time is fully restored you are granted  an ever-growing score multiplier.
  • When the time runs out the game ends.
  • You can trash unneeded tiles, but beware: doing so will reset your multiplier.
